byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Emmarie Huetteman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Saying “it’s regrettable that there was some confusion on the rollout,” the speaker said he remained broadly supportive of the order.
snippet: Saying “it’s regrettable that there was some confusion on the rollout,” the speaker said he remained broadly supportive of the order....

headline.main: Ryan Stands by Trump’s Executive Order, Offering Only Gentle Criticism
headline.print_headline: With Gentle Criticism, Ryan Backs Trump Ban
